# Trauma

## C-Spine Trauma

[**NEXUS Criterior**]{.maroon}

Trauma patients **do not** require cervical spine imaging if:

-   Alert and Stable
-   No AOC
-   No focal neurological deficit
-   Not Intoxicated
-   No midline spinal tenderness
-   no distracting injury

([radiopedia](https://radiopaedia.org/articles/54089))
